name: redos-checker
description: 1. This Github Action crawls through the following files, gets the regexes and passes them through the redos checker.  2. Note: This runs only newly added regexes.      - .conf (modsec-crs-conf between '@rx and '\ )     - .java     - .py     - OPTIONAL : Add .dat files as well. (Cant work with the new crs-toolchain, hence modsec-crs-rules.conf)
